h2_title: How to Find Mother of Flamlings
h3_title: Mother of Flamlings Boss Fight and Guide
content: These will land on the ground and turn into glowing patches. Unfortunately, these will become Flamlings, so be mindful of these as you run around the arena.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mother_of_Flamlings.md', within the main section titled 'Mother of Flamlings', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Mother of Flamlings' and the sub-subsection 'Mother of Flamlings Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
These will land on the ground and turn into glowing patches. Unfortunately, these will become Flamlings, so be mindful of these as you run around the arena.
